sentences.en: All the places and characters in my novel are entirely fictitious.
sentences.cn: 我这篇小说中所有的地点和人物都是虚构的.

sentences.en: His account of the bank robbery was completely fictitious.
sentences.cn: 他叙述的抢劫银行事件完全是虚假的.

sentences.en: His account of the incident was totally fictitious.
sentences.cn: 他对这一事故的描述完全是虚构的.

sentences.en: Legends grew up around a great many figures, both real and fictitious.
sentences.cn: 围绕着许多人物都有传说流传开，有真实的也有虚构的。

sentences.en: On stage, the actor adopts a fictitious persona.
sentences.cn: 舞台上, 演员扮演虛构的人物.

sentences.en: She was sure his equanimity was fictitious.
sentences.cn: 她确信他的镇定是佯装的.

sentences.en: The account he gives of his childhood is quite fictitious.
sentences.cn: 他把童年往事说得很假.

sentences.en: The characters in this story are all fictitious.
sentences.cn: 这个故事里的人物都是假想的.

sentences.en: The persons and events portrayed in this production are fictitious.
sentences.cn: 这部作品中描述的人物和事件均属虚构。

sentences.en: The story my mother told me when I was young is fictitious.
sentences.cn: 小时候妈妈对我讲的那个故事是虚构的.

sentences.en: They bought the materials under fictitious names.
sentences.cn: 他们用假名买下了那些材料.

sentences.en: Unlikely and fantastic legends grew up around a great many figures, both real and fictitious.
sentences.cn: 围绕着许许多多或真实或虚构的人物，产生了一些不可思议、荒诞离奇的传说。

sentences.en: We're interested in the source of these fictitious rumours.
sentences.cn: 我们对这些子虚乌有的谣言从何而来很感兴趣。

words.tran_cn: 虚构的；想象上的；虚伪的

trans.tran_cn: 虚构的，编造的，假定的，虚设的，小说式的，假装的
